Text: So, this is my first mixtape. What do you think? Hear anything you like?
Great mix you've done there. I just love Dervish and Flook. There were some other good stuff also. Please seed more good Irish stuff. It's so hard to find! / Fjalar
I'd like to have all albums with dervish and Flook. So if you have them. Put them up please :) And if you have some live clips or something....do the same with them!

have you any irish republican music? you have a good selection there, keep it up hail hail
This was a GREAT compilation!  Put it on my mp3 player so I can play it all the time.  The music of Solas is my favorite.  Have to see if I can find more.
This sounds like a brilliant mix, I found this today after looking for some more Lunasa - they're a great band, and thanks for sharing the other stuff here as well :-)

Wow. This is one of the best torrents I've downloaded from TPB. I rarely even log into the site, but my thorough enjoyment of each of these songs is an occasion for me to express my love for this torrent. Thank youuuuuuuuuuuuu :-D
